narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st pre-license inspection for a Class "C" and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
The applicant must send the licensee fee to the following address:
   USDA, APHIS, AC 
   2150 Centre Ave, Bldg B,  Mail Stop #3W11
   Fort Collins, CO  80526-8117
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
